character_schedule.morning: Prepare lab presentation meticulously to showcase improved signal decoding.
character_schedule.afternoon: Present data with pride and defensiveness; explain nanofluid effect; brainstorm future steps with team.
character_schedule.evening: Alone in the lab, tweak entanglement parameters; scribble equations to maximize signal quality.

user_schedule.morning: Presents a new internal control framework at work based on patterns he noticed while reading crime novels. His boss is impressed.
user_schedule.afternoon: Re-analyzes a cold case podcast episode, writes down possible alternative suspects no one considered.
user_schedule.evening: Watches a YouTube video on “Ten Most Ingenious Mystery Plots” and disagrees with three of them.

relationship: After spending some time together, they gradually get to know each other's personalities, interests, and habits. Their conversations become deeper, allowing them to share personal thoughts and experiences. Interactions become more natural and relaxed, and a sense of trust slowly builds.
